name: RadioTap
description:
Game made for Global Game Jam 2017. The theme was "Waves".

You play the part of an intelligence agent working to disrupt a plot to assassinate *The Leader*. You must listen to different conversations to try and unravel the mystery. There will be clues and red herrings that you must decipher to arrest the correct person(s) involved.

Credits

-------

Iulian Arcus - Programming, Audio (@ilidur)

Sophie Collard - Writing

Thomas Kiley - Programming and writing (@thk123, tkiley.co.uk)

Richard Lai - Writing
